nodes.text: Corweillians were the inhabitants of the Corweillia system in the Mid Rim. Von Taub was a Corweillian.

The Corweillian Von Taub appears in the novel Jedi Apprentice: The Evil Experiment, written by Jude Watson and published by Scholastic in 2001. The book does not specify whether the term Corweillian refers to a sentient species or is merely a demonym, such as Corellian or Hapan.
